jobDescription: Requirements/Job Duties:WWT Asynchrony Labs has an opportunity available for a Delivery Lead. Delivery Lead is a leadership role working with Asynchrony software delivery teams that is focused on delivery assurance. This role is responsible for managing customer expectations, the flow of work to customers, assuring delivery of value, and ensuring wide open lines of communication with the customer.
